activities:
The OneLogin Enterprise Identity Management Solution provides a platform for managing user identities in the cloud and behind the firewall. The personal data collected about users consists of first name, last name, and email address.

Email address is used during the authentication process when users sign into OneLogin. The email address identifies the user in OneLogin at which point authentication is delegated to the customer's internal directory.

Email, first name, and last name are only used inside the application and when activity in OneLogin triggers automated emails; e.g., password reset workflow.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Authentication data (e.g., email address, password). Data does not include data manually processed by OneLogin.
